Package org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanproduct.domain

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LoanProductMinimumRepaymentScheduleRelatedDetail
    Represents the bare minimum repayment details needed for activities related to generating repayment schedules.
    LoanProductRepository  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LoanProduct
    Loan products allow for categorisation of an organisations loans into something meaningful to them.
    LoanProductBorrowerCycleVariations  
    LoanProductConfigurableAttributes  
    LoanProductFloatingRates  
    LoanProductGuaranteeDetails
    Entity for capturing interest recalculation settings
    LoanProductInterestRecalculationDetails
    Entity for capturing interest recalculation settings
    LoanProductMinMaxConstraints
    LoanProductMinMaxConstraints encapsulates all the Min and Max details of a LoanProduct.
    LoanProductRelatedDetail
    LoanRepaymentScheduleDetail encapsulates all the details of a LoanProduct that are also used and persisted by a Loan.
    LoanProductTrancheDetails  
    LoanProductVariableInstallmentConfig  
    LoanTransactionProcessingStrategy  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AmortizationMethod  
    InterestCalculationPeriodMethod  
    InterestMethod  
    InterestRecalculationCompoundingMethod
    People typically use either of the following settings when defining interest recalculation method: NONE INTEREST FEE INTEREST_AND_FEE
    InterestRecalculationPeriodMethod
    People typically use either of the following settings when defining interest recalculation method: SAME_AS_REPAYMENT_PERIOD DAILY WEEKLY FORTNIGHTLY MONTHLY
    LendingStrategy
    INDIVIDUAL_LOAN: Individual loans are applicable only to clients.
    LoanPreClosureInterestCalculationStrategy  
    LoanProductParamType  
    LoanProductValueConditionType  
    LoanRescheduleStrategyMethod
    People typically use either of the following settings when defining interest recalculation method: RESCHEDULE_NEXT_REPAYMENTS REDUCE_NUMBER_OF_INSTALLMENTS REDUCE_EMI_AMOUNT
    RecalculationFrequencyType
